page.title: 06Clive Village Shop
page.content: {The Village Shop}is situated in the main street in Clive. It is a general food store and a{Post Office.}Mr. and Mrs. Brown own and run the shop, opening it at{9am}and closing it at {5.30pm.}It closes for an hour at lunchtime and on Wednesday afternoons. The shop sells items such as bread, fruit, vegetables, bacon and cheese as well as frozen goods and tinned food. Household goods such as bleach, soap, brushes,washing powder and the like are also sold although the range of brands is limited as the shop's turnover is not great. The shop operates as an{off-licence} selling wines and spirits and tobacco. Many of the inhabitants of Clive shop for their daily needs at this shop as it is within walking distance of their homes.
